p: This study was conducted in the research farm of Faculty of Agriculture, Urmia University, located in Western Azerbaijan province, Iran (Long. 45°10′ E., Lat. 37°44′ N., Alt. 1338 m.) in the crop season of 2017–2018. Table 1 and Table 2 show the soil characteristics and climatic conditions of the research farm, respectively. Fertilizer requirements were calculated based on the results of soil analysis and fertilizer recommendations and they were incorporated with soil before sowing.
